p: Malaria remains a devastating disease, and Anopheles midgut protein fibrinogen-related protein 1 (FREP1) mediates Plasmodium transmission ( Li et al. 2013; Zhang et al., 2015; Niu et al., 2017). FREP1 mediates Plasmodium invasion in mosquitoes by binding to P.Â falciparum gametocytes or ookinetes ( Zhang et al., 2015).
